channel.title: Git based blog, website, anything
channel.description:
The news [url=https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,950.0.html]Qubes News: New Git-based Blog[/url] reminded me to research again after I did that a long time ago, if there is any possibilities on `git`ifying whonix.org's web apps.
Currently `git`ified: - whonix.org /var/www folder: https://github.com/Whonix/www - whonix.org mediawiki xml dumps: https://github.com/WhonixBOT/WhonixWikiBackups
Get a backup!
Non-ideal. Would be preferable to have the whole mediawiki content managed by git as well.
Found two wordpress plugins. gitium and Revisr. No luck so far:
- https://github.com/PressLabs/gitium/issues/68 - https://github.com/ExpandedFronts/Revisr/issues/29

item.title: Git based blog, website, anything
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Update!

Backup using git-mediawiki:

GitHub

Whonix/whonix-wiki-backup

Backup using git-mediawiki. Alternative to XML Backups https://github.com/WhonixBOT/WhonixWikiBackups | https://github.com/WhonixBOT/whonix-wiki-backup - Whonix/whonix-wiki-backup

Alternative to XML Backups:

GitHub

WhonixBOT/WhonixWikiBackups

Contribute to WhonixBOT/WhonixWikiBackups development by creating an account on GitHub.

Read full topic

item.description:
The news Qubes News: New Git-based Blog reminded me to research again after I did that a long time ago, if there is any possibilities on gitifying whonix.orgâ€™s web apps.

Currently gitified:

  • whonix.org /var/www folder: https://github.com/Whonix/www
  • whonix.org mediawiki xml dumps: https://github.com/WhonixBOT/WhonixWikiBackups
